metadata.server_name: MCP Server for Singapore Government Open Data

tools.name: datagovsg_list_collections
tools.description: List all collections on data.gov.sg

tools.name: datagovsg_get_collection
tools.description: Get metadata for a specific data.gov.sg collection

collectionId.description: The unique identifier of the collection

tools.name: datagovsg_list_datasets
tools.description: List all datasets on data.gov.sg

tools.name: datagovsg_get_dataset_metadata
tools.description: Get metadata for a specific data.gov.sg dataset

datasetId.description: The unique identifier of the dataset

tools.name: datagovsg_search_dataset
tools.description: Search for data within a data.gov.sg dataset

tools.name: datagovsg_initiate_download
tools.description: Initiate download of a data.gov.sg dataset with optional filtering

filters.description: Filters to apply to the dataset

tools.name: datagovsg_poll_download
tools.description: Check data.gov.sg download status and get download URL

tools.name: singstat_search_resources
tools.description: Search for SingStat tables by keyword (works best with single words)

tools.name: singstat_get_metadata
tools.description: Get metadata for a specific SingStat table

resourceId.description: Resource ID of the table (e.g., M015171)

tools.name: singstat_get_table_data
tools.description: Get data from a specific SingStat table with optional filtering

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return (max 5000)

sortBy.description: Sort order (not applicable for cross-sectional tables)

timeFilter.description: Filter by time periods (e.g., "2017,2018" for annual, "2018 Mar" for monthly)

seriesNoORrowNo.description: Series number for time series or row number for cross-sectional tables

server_info_crawled.name: MCP Server for Singapore Government Open Data
server_info_crawled.overview: Provide seamless access to open datasets and collections from data.gov.sg. Enable searching, metadata retrieval, and filtered dataset downloads for analysis.
